summary.span: 从当前集合中删除 的一个集合并返回得到的（新）集合。

span.span: Removes a collection of from the current collection and returns the resultant (new) collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前集合保持不变。The current collection remains unchanged. 如果要删除的集合不是当前集合的子集，然后不删除任何元素。If the collection to be removed is not a subset of the current collection, then no element is removed. 如果源集合具有多个实例的项，将删除的项的所有实例。If the source collection has multiple instances of an item, then all instances of the item are removed.
